mapper.insert: insert into dcdg_basic_feedback_base (FEEDBACK_ID, FEEDBACK_TYPE, FEEDBACK_CONT, CUST_ID, CUST_NAME, CUST_PHONE, FEEDBACK_IMG, ADD_TIME, ANSWER_CONT, DEAL_USER, DEAL_USER_NAME, DEAL_TIME, DEAL_STATUS) values (#{feedbackId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{feedbackType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{feedbackCont,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feedbackImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{answerCont,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dealUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dealStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update dcdg_basic_feedback_base set FEEDBACK_TYPE = #{feedbackType,jdbcType=CHAR}, FEEDBACK_CONT = #{feedbackCont,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=CHAR}, CUST_NAME = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_PHONE = #{custPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEEDBACK_IMG = #{feedbackImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ANSWER_CONT = #{answerCont,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEAL_USER = #{dealUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, DEAL_USER_NAME = #{dealUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEAL_TIME = #{dealTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEAL_STATUS = #{dealStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT} where FEEDBACK_ID = #{feedbackId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select FEEDBACK_ID, FEEDBACK_TYPE, FEEDBACK_CONT, CUST_ID, CUST_NAME, CUST_PHONE, FEEDBACK_IMG, ADD_TIME, ANSWER_CONT, DEAL_USER, DEAL_USER_NAME, DEAL_TIME, DEAL_STATUS from dcdg_basic_feedback_base where FEEDBACK_ID = #{feedbackId,jdbcType=CHAR}
